main event: A group of 5 to 7 spheroid-shaped objects were observed hovering over Columbus, Ohio on January 31, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as large and hovered at a very great altitude., The observation was made at 1900 EST., The terrain type was not specified in the report., The objects displayed no significant maneuvers other than hovering., A hand-written note suggested the objects might be a hot air balloon, despite their unusual characteristics.
